name: Beef Burgers
headline: high-protein meal
description: A traditional ground beef burger can be a good, high-protein meal—especially if it's grass-finished beef, which we'll tell you more about in a second.

OtherTypes.name: Wild Salmon
OtherTypes.headline: low in calories
OtherTypes.description: when it comes to proteins, wild salmon is an MVP: It's rich in omega-3's, the healthy fatty acids you find in fish oils that can help lower your risk for heart disease and that fend off metabolism-slowing inflammation

OtherTypes.name: Black Bean
OtherTypes.headline: nutritional praise
OtherTypes.description: Black beans pack 8 grams of protein and 7.5 grams of fiber in a 1/2-cup serving, but they're low in calories and free of saturated fat.

name: Cheese Pizza
headline: To up the nutrients
description: To up the nutrients in cheese pizza, choose a whole-grain crust when possible and go “easy” on any high-fat cheese.

OtherTypes.name: Veggie Pizza
OtherTypes.headline: More veggies?
OtherTypes.description: Health-ifying junk food recipes has to be one of the easiest ways to convince your friends that quitting sugar ain’t all that bad!
